meanings.definition: Eager to know or learn something.
meanings.sent1: The curiousest student in class always asks questions.
meanings.sent2: She is the curiousest person I know, always wanting to explore new things.
meanings.sent3: The curiousest puppy in the litter kept sniffing around the garden.
meanings.sent4: His curiousest nature led him to discover hidden treasures in the old attic.
meanings.sent5: The curiousest child in the group eagerly listened to the story.

meanings.definition: Strange or unusual in a way that excites interest.
meanings.sent1: The curiousest object in the museum was a glowing rock.
meanings.sent2: The old house on the hill had the curiousest decorations.
meanings.sent3: The curiousest noise came from the abandoned building at night.
meanings.sent4: Her curiousest dream involved flying through a candy-filled sky.
meanings.sent5: The curiousest plant in the garden bloomed only once a year.
